name: Tika Waylan
description: A spirited young barmaid from the Inn of the Last Home who proves herself a capable warrior when crisis strikes. Her fiery red curls match her passionate nature, and her skill with a frying pan in combat is as legendary as her warm heart. Though she begins as a simple tavern server, her courage, determination, and growing love for Caramon Majere help her develop into a true hero.

features.name: Fighting Style: Two-Weapon Fighting
features.description: Add your ability modifier to the damage of your off-hand attack

features.name: Second Wind
features.description: Once per short rest, bonus action to regain 1d10 + fighter level HP

biography.appearance: A pretty young woman with curly red hair, wearing practical clothing suitable for serving at an inn
biography.backstory: Raised at the Inn of the Last Home in Solace after being orphaned, Tika learned to defend herself while working as a barmaid
biography.personalityTraits: Practical and hardworking, with a fierce protective streak
biography.ideals: Protecting those who can't protect themselves
biography.bonds: The Inn of the Last Home and its patrons are my family
biography.flaws: Quick to anger when those she cares about are threatened
